page.title: 15Boys' games, Balornock
page.content: I am a ten year old boy and I live in Balornock,Glasgow.I attend Knockburn Primary School.The children in our school play lots of different games like football,tig and rounders.My favourite game is{Netbask Ball.}This is how you play.You need two benches and a ball.You also need two teams with about six players in each and a referee.Each team must choose one of its players to be a keeper.One keeper stands on each bench.Each team stands spread out in front of the opposing team's bench ie the bench with the opposing team's keeper on it.The idea of the game is for each team to try to get the ball to its own keeper while stopping the other team from getting the ball to its keeper.Each time a keeper has the ball he scores a point for his team.After ten minutes the team with most points wins.
